Header.Info: Performance Monitoring Events for Intel(R) Core(TM) processors based on Lunar Lake performance hybrid architecture - V1.18

Events.BriefDescription: Read CAS command sent to DRAM
Events.PublicDescription: Read CAS command sent to DRAM

Events.BriefDescription: Write CAS command sent to DRAM
Events.PublicDescription: Write CAS command sent to DRAM

Events.BriefDescription: Total number of read and write byte transfers to/from DRAM, in 32B chunk, per DDR channel. Counter increments by 1 after sending  or receiving 32B chunk data.
Events.PublicDescription: Total number of read and write byte transfers to/from DRAM, in 32B chunk, per DDR channel. Counter increments by 1 after sending  or receiving 32B chunk data.

Events.BriefDescription: This 48-bit fixed counter counts the UCLK cycles.
Events.PublicDescription: This 48-bit fixed counter counts the UCLK cycles.
